What our customers say about us: Qu'est-ce que nos clients disent de nous
Since implementing Omnisensa, we have re: Depuis la mise en œuvre d’Omnisensa, nous avons reçu beaucoup plus d’avis Google, ce qui a contribué à attirer de nouveaux clients dans notre café. Ce que j’apprécie le plus de travailler avec Omnisensa, c’est leur engagement sincère à personnaliser la solution à notre concept!
With Omnisensa, we were finally able to: With Omnisensa, we were finally able to offer our guests a platform to give personal feedback. Thus, we continued to optimize the experience and satisfaction for our guests. Omnisensa not only customized the solution to my wishes, but also gave us honest advice on potential improvements.
